DescriptionData.Title: Vintage Style Victorian Sewing Case
DescriptionData.Description:
Lifting the lid on this adorable sewing box allows all sides to unfold revealing a treasure trove of sewing accessories, with everything you will need to start sewing, it even has a built in pin cushion in the middle.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!

DescriptionData.Title: Love To Sew Rounded Sewing Basket
DescriptionData.Description:
A very pretty large rounded sewing chest giving you room for plenty of sewing accessories and it is all upholstered in come gorgeous quality quilting cotton form the Love To Sew collection from Michael Miller.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Size Width 31cm Depth 22cm Height 20cm

DescriptionData.Title: Fox & The Houndstooth Craft Hamper
DescriptionData.Description:
If you love crafts then there is nothing better than a hamper like this, made out of the brilliant print from Robert Kaufman from the Fox & The Houndstooth collection, on a wooden frame perfect for storing yarn and needles.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Size Width 36cm Depth 22cm Height 36cm With a clear sleeve for needle storage.

DescriptionData.Title: Large Square Twin Lid Sewing Case
DescriptionData.Description:
A stunning large sewing chest with two lids giving you room for plenty of sewing accessories and it is all upholstered in come gorgeous quality quilting cotton and finished with a wicker style binding and handle.
Why not treat somebody special to this, it will make an excellent gift. Or you could just treat yourself!
Size Width 26cm Depth 26cm Height 18cm

DescriptionData.Title: Set Of 2 Button Tins
DescriptionData.Description:
2 Metal nested tins, perfect for storage. An attractive button picture on the lid and a wood effect to the sides.
Box 1: Width : 15 cm Length : 15 cm Height : 6 cm
Box 2: Width : 14 cm Length : 10 cm Height : 6 cm

DescriptionData.Title: Free Spirit - Design Roll Slipper Rose 30pcs
DescriptionData.Description: Design Roll of 30 pre-cut strips of fabric from the Slipper Rose collection by Tanya Whelan from Free Spirit. Luxurious floral designs with timeless roses in soft and deep colours. Design Roll 2.5in x 44in

DescriptionData.Title: Oak 9 Slot Wooden Ruler Holder
DescriptionData.Description:
No sewing space of any note should be without one of these racks, made from solid oak wood. Handmade by a craftsman in Buffalo, Minnesota.
7 inches square, perfect for storing all kinds of rulers in.

DescriptionData.Title: Riley Blake Yellow Basics Charm Pack: Precut 5' Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Charm Pack contains 24 pre-cut squares of fabric from the ranges of Riley Blake basics. There is something for everyone here with chevrons, sports, dots, stripes and gingham, all co-ordinated in the same colour. Each piece of fabric measures 5" x 5"

DescriptionData.Title: Riley Blake Basics Hot Pink Precut 10' Stacker Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Stacker Pack contains 24 pre-cut squares of fabric from the ranges of Riley Blake basics. There is something for everyone here with chevrons, sports, dots, stripes and gingham, all co-ordinated in the same colour. Each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

DescriptionData.Title: Riley Blake Basics Yellow Precut 10' Stacker Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Stacker Pack contains 24 pre-cut squares of fabric from the ranges of Riley Blake basics. There is something for everyone here with chevrons, sports, dots, stripes and gingham, all co-ordinated in the same colour. Each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

DescriptionData.Title: Riley Blake Basics Gray Precut 10' Stacker Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Stacker Pack contains 24 pre-cut squares of fabric from the ranges of Riley Blake basics. There is something for everyone here with chevrons, sports, dots, stripes and gingham, all co-ordinated in the same colour. Each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

DescriptionData.Title: Craft-Fuse Pellon 15in x 4yd
DescriptionData.Description: Crisp, iron-on fabric backing adds both body and strength. This interfacing is perfect for home decor projects, clothing accessories, and children's toys.

DescriptionData.Title: Omnigrid Ruler 6' x 24'
DescriptionData.Description: This size ruler is the most popular ruler for the beginner and advanced crafter alike. It is primarily used for cutting long strips and is designed for construction of multiple-angle pieces when quilting. Get a perfect straight line when cutting your fabric.

DescriptionData.Title: Miss Kate Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the Miss Kate collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

DescriptionData.Title: Avant Garden Charm Pack From Moda: Precut 5' Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Charm Pack contain 42 prints from the Avant Garden collection from Moda and each piece of fabric measures 5" x 5"

DescriptionData.Title: Avant Garden Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the Avant Garden collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

DescriptionData.Title: Dottie Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the Dottie collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

DescriptionData.Title: Vilene Iron-on Bias Tape: White: 5m x 12mm
DescriptionData.Description:
White bias-cut tape for the securing of shaped or rounded edges.
Use with light colour fabrics.
Iron on dry, with pressure.
Machine washable at 40 degrees. Dry cleanable

DescriptionData.Title: Vilene Framilastic Tape: Transparent: 5m x 6mm
DescriptionData.Description:
A transparent sew-on seamless elastic Polyurethane tape for lingerie, swimwear and sportswear.
Ideal for shoulder seams, top edges, seams, armholes.
Non allergenic.
Machine washable at 30°C with reduced spin. Dry cleanable

DescriptionData.Title: Vilene Iron-on Bias Tape: Charcoal: 5m x 12mm
DescriptionData.Description:
Charcoal bias-cut tape for the securing of shaped or rounded edges.
Use with dark colour fabrics.
Iron on dry, with pressure.
Machine washable at 40 degrees. Dry cleanable

DescriptionData.Title: Vilene Framilastic Tape: Transparent: 5m x 9mm
DescriptionData.Description:
A transparent sew-on seamless elastic Polyurethane tape for lingerie, swimwear and sportswear.
Ideal for shoulder seams, top edges, seams, armholes.
Non allergenic.
Machine washable at 30°C with reduced spin. Dry cleanable

DescriptionData.Title: 'Grant Park' Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description:
This layer cake contains fabrics from Grant Park collection designed by Minnick & Simpson.

Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the same collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"

For full details of this collection please see here

DescriptionData.Title: Grant Park Charm Pack From Moda: Precut 5' Squares
DescriptionData.Description:
This charm pack contains fabrics from Grant Park collection designed by Minnick & Simpson. 

Charm pack contain 42 prints from the same collection and each piece of fabric measures 5" x 5"

For full details of this collection please see here

DescriptionData.Title: 'Printemps' Charm Pack From Moda: Precut 5' Squares
DescriptionData.Description:
There is no place the 3 Sisters love more than Paris in springtime. Leisurely strolls along the Seine and into the many lovely gardens are the inspiration for Printemps. Aptly named after the French word for spring and the sisters’ favorite department store in Paris, Printemps is the crème de la crème in a deliciously soft palette of delicate floral prints that appear as though they were fresh picked from Marie Antoinette’s garden at Versailles.

Charm Pack contain 42 prints from the same collection and each piece of fabric measures 5" x 5"

For full details of this collection please see here

DescriptionData.Title: 'Bee My Honey' Jelly Roll From Moda
DescriptionData.Description:
This jelly roll contains fabrics from the Bee My Honey collection.

Jelly rolls contains 40 2.5 inch strips from the same collection.

DescriptionData.Title: 'Folklore' Layer Cake From Moda: Precut 10' Squares
DescriptionData.Description: Layer cakes contain 42 prints from the Folklore collection and each piece of fabric measures 10" x 10"
